definitions.definition: (especially of a person) pleasant, friendly, and easy to like.
examples: pleasant, nice, friendly, agreeable, affable, amiable, genial, personable, charming, popular, good-natured, engaging, appealing, endearing, convivial, congenial, simpatico, winning, delightful, enchanting, lovable, adorable, sweet; Moreinformaldarling, lovely "a likable guy"Moredarling, lovely a likable guy
